trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging> event when a Select button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging>hendelse når en Select-knappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen behandler select-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: (A Select a button is one whose `CommandName` property is set to "Select".) This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the select operation.
trans-unit.target: (En Velg en er en der `CommandName` er satt til "Velg".) Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel avbryter select-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A ListViewSelectEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the item that is selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: En ListViewSelectEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, slik at du kan finne indeksen for elementet som er valgt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: It also enables you to cancel the select operation.
trans-unit.target: Det også mulig å avbryte operasjonen select.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the select operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the ListViewSelectEventArgs object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte operasjonen select, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>for ListViewSelectEventArgs-objektet til `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the ListViewSelectEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av klassen ListViewSelectEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes primært av kontrollutviklere ved å heve hendelser.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs.NewSelectedIndex%2A>|The value of the `newSelectedIndex` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs.NewSelectedIndex%2A>| Verdien for den `newSelectedIndex` parameteren. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs.NewSelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the new item to select in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for det nye elementet du velger i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the new item to select in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen for det nye elementet du velger i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control performs the select operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging?displayProperty=fullName>inntreffer før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen utfører operasjonen select.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the control to determine the index of the new item selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Du kan derfor ikke bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>kontrollen ikke fastsette indeksen for det nye elementet som er valgt av brukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property contains the index of the previously selected item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen inneholder indeksen til det tidligere valgte elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the new item that is selected by the user, use the NewSelectedIndex property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk NewSelectedIndex-egenskapen til å fastslå indeksen for det nye elementet som er valgt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically override the selected item index by setting it to another value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne egenskapen overstyrer programmatisk merket element indeksen ved å sette verdien til en annen verdi.

trans-unit.source: The index of the new item to select in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for det nye elementet du velger i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.
